creator: peterhansson_se@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 35043
Screenshot of what the Javadoc looks like

The Javadoc for the Tomcat class (used by those who embed Tomcat) is close to impossible to read. See attached PNG file.

Hi,

Thanks for the report and the patch.
Fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.0.M22 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.16 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.45 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.79 onwards

Regards,
Violeta
creator: violetagg@apache.org
